item.title: Former Indiana Rep. Lee Hamilton, leader of Sept. 11 panel, dies at 94
item.description: Former Rep. Lee Hamilton, a crewcut-wearing Indiana Democrat who was a leading foreign affairs voice during three decades in Congress, has died

item.title: Particle pollution from wildfire smoke was tied to 24,100 deaths a year in US: Study
item.description: A new study out in the journal Science Advances finds that chronic exposure to wildfire smoke has contributed to tens of thousands of deaths each year...

item.title: Firefighters rescue swan stuck in frozen Connecticut river
item.description: Firefighters came to the rescue of a swan found stuck in a frozen Connecticut river this week
